metadata.title: Release Notes
metadata.description: Release Notes for Envoy AI Gateway

releases.title: Version 0.4 Release
releases.description: Major release with MCP Gateway, Image Generation, first-party Anthropic, guided decoding for GCP Vertex AI/Gemini, cross-namespace support, enhanced authentication, and client SDK.

releases.title: Version 0.3 Release
releases.description: Intelligent inference routing with Endpoint Picker Provider, Google Vertex AI support, and enhanced observability.
